page.title: 12TRANSPORT AND ROADS
page.content: Every household runs a{Car}(essential for village life,particularly since bus services are declining rapidly), some run 2 or more.The village roads are hard_surfaced,farm tracks used by tractors are not made up.The roads are very narrow,there is not enough room for 2 cars to pass."Verge_hopping" is a common part of country life!The roads & road drainage are maintained by the district council. The village{Minibus}is garaged at the hall.Subsidised by the district council & driven by volunteers,it provides regular trips to local towns & excursions for local groups.Most families own more than 1{bicycle:}a few,motor_bikes or scooters.There is also an{horse and cart}used for the daily milk round during the summer months.
